item.title: ECS
item.description: Who will deliver ECS in Vietnamese? # All course facilitators are Eastern Hemisphere Townhall (ETH) Core Team Members. What is the main delivery content and language? # All content will be in English and delivered in Vietnamese. How to enrol for these sessions? # Information will be available through Telegram, Facebook, Eastern Townhall Website, and from bi-weekly meetings. How long each session will be held? # Each session takes up to 120 mins.
